value.title: ControlUp raises $27 million to apply AI to remote machine monitoring
value.excerpt: ControlUp, a platform leveraging AI to help monitor desktops remotely, has raised $27 million in venture capital funding.

value.title: Apple M1 chip will save $2.5b a year after dumping Intel for the M1 chip
value.excerpt: Apple's decision to quit Intel and use its own M1 chip to power the latest MacBook Pro, MacBook Air, and Mac Mini will save the company $2.5 billion, according to a new report. value.title: Neural’s guide to the glorious future of AI: Here’s how machines become sentient
value.excerpt: Welcome to Neural’s guide guide to the glorious future of AI. What wonders will tomorrow’s machines be capable of? How do we get from Alexa and Siri to Rosie the Robot and R2D2? In this speculative science series we’ll put our optimist hats on and try to answer those questions and more.

value.title: IBM acquires Instana for its AI-powered app performance monitoring

value.title: Financial services companies are starting to use the cloud for big data and AI processing
value.excerpt: The financial sector has historically been nervous about allowing its data to go off premises, making it harder to scale. Now it's allowing for some data in the cloud to speed AI and data management.

value.title: AI helps create the Milky Way’s family tree — tracking eons of galactic mergers
